thread.title: Robbie Keane scores back garden belter against son - and mercilessly rubs it in
thread.title_full: Robbie Keane scores back garden belter against son - and mercilessly rubs it in

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Robbie Keane scores back garden belter against son - and mercilessly rubs it in
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
LA Galaxy striker Robbie Keane has uploaded a hilarious video of him being an absolute savage of a father. 
The Irishman can be seen playing football in his back garden with his son - and taking it very seriously. 
In the video, daddy Keane lines up what appears to be a free-kick, while kid Keane takes his place in goal and limbers up. 
"Here we go," says Keane Sr. "Keane against Keane what we got? Let's see." 
The 36-year-old then proceeds to leather one in off the bar. It's a beauty of a strike. (Photo: Robbie Keane / Facebook) 
Keane immediately screams in joy followed by a cry of "what a goal". 
"What you gotta say about that Little Keano?" says Keane, after gloating in his son's face. (Photo: Robbie Keane / Facebook) 
To which his son simply replies by throwing his arm in disgust. Like us on Facebook
